name: Malice
description: Destroy a friendly minion to summon 4/4 Husks equal to its Attack nearby.

name: Divine Liturgy
description: Give all friendly minions +Attack equal to their Health.

name: Lifestream
description: Fully heal a friendly minion, then draw a copy of it from your deck.

name: Marching Orders
description: Give friendly minions directly in front of and behind your General +2/+2.  If they have Zeal, they cannot be targeted by enemy spells.

name: Lionize
description: Give Celerity to a friendly minion directly behind your General.

name: Amaranthine Vow
description: Summon around your General all friendly minions with Provoke that died this game.

name: Meditate
description: Shuffle five copies of the spell you cast most recently into your deck (excluding Meditate).

name: Knucklestorm
description: Intensify: Deal 1 damage to an enemy.

name: Kensho Vortex
description: Costs 1 less for each spell you cast this game. Whenever you cast a spell this turn, summon a minion that costs up to 2 more nearby your General.

name: Pandatentiary
description: Surround the enemy General with friendly Panddo that disappear at the start of your next turn.

name: Phoenix Barrage
description: Deal 3 damage to anything.\nPut a Phoenix Fire into your action bar.

name: Second Self
description: Put an EXACT copy of a friendly minion into your action bar.

name: Accumulonimbus
description: Intensify: Summon 2 Wind Dervishes nearby your General.

name: Wither
description: An enemy minion disappears at the start of your next turn.

name: Circle of Fabrication
description: Summon one of each Obelysk from your deck on random spaces.

name: Planar Foundry
description: Draw an artifact from your deck.

name: Synaptic Arbitrage
description: Give your opponent a minion to take control of nearby enemy minions with less Attack.

name: Metalmeld
description: Equip a friendly artifact that was destroyed this game.

name: Painful Pluck
description: Intensify: Turn 1 random space into Shadow Creep, prioritizing spaces under enemy minions.

name: Yielding Depths
description: If you have three or more Shadow Creep, draw 2 cards.

name: Munch
description: Steal Health from an enemy minion for each friendly Shadow Creep (but not more than its Health).

name: Demonic Conversion
description: Draw a minion from your opponent\

name: Unleash the Evil
description: Summon a copy of the minion your opponent most recently summoned from their action bar. It gains Rush and Flying.

name: Invigoration
description: Intensify: Restore 3 Health to your General.

name: Deep Impact
description: Deal damage to a minion to reduce its Health to 1.

name: Mitotic Induction
description: Summon an Egg of the minion most recently summoned from your action bar.

name: Extinction Event
description: Each of your Eggs hatches into a Katastrophosaurus.

name: Bellow
description: Give a friendly minion +3 Attack.\nStun enemy minions around it.

name: Lesser Waterball
description: Deal 4 damage to an enemy minion.

name: Ice Age
description: Summon Blazing Spines along the outside of the battlefield.

name: Wanderlust
description: Intensify: Teleport 1 random enemy minion to a space on your starting side of the battlefield.

name: Endless Hunt
description: Summon a 3/3 Vespyr Night Howler.\nPut an Endless Hunt into your action bar.

name: Aspect of Ego
description: Transform ANY minion into a random minion of the same cost.

name: Permafrost
description: Stun an enemy minion.\nStunned enemy minions Stun a nearby enemy.

name: Brilliant Plume
description: Restore 1 Health to your General.\nDraw a card.
